entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is Harry's companion who screams ahead of him in the mist. ("Her scream seemed to have come from somewhere ahead.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the protagonist who is hesitating whether to walk through the mist or not. ("He was still hesitating when a scream shattered the silence." "Harry yelled.")

entities.name: mist
entities.description: The enchanted mist that Harry and Fleur are walking in. ("What would happen if he walked through the mist?" "He took a deep breath and ran through the enchanted mist.")

relationships.description: Harry yelled at Fleur when he heard her scream. ("‘Fleur?’ Harry yelled.")
Harry walked through the enchanted mist. ("He took a deep breath and ran through the enchanted mist.")
